p: Animals were anesthesiaded with ketamine/Xylazine in all procedures and all experiments were done with agreement of Ethics Committee on Animal Use (Comitê de Ética no Uso de Animais—CEUA) of the Federal University of Viçosa, protocol number 63–2013, established by the National Animal Experimentation Control Council (Conselho Nacional de Controle de Experimentação Animal—CONCEA), an organ that is part of the Brazilian Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation (MCTI).
